title: [UPDATED] Schedule Maintenance - Patch 5.1 - 16/01/2015
body:
Summoners,

On 16/01/2015, starting at 03:30 AM AEDT, ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.1. At 05:00 AM AEDT, the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded.

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 6 hours.

The size of the patch is approximately 200mb.

EDIT:
* We have delayed the patch by 24 hours. The new deploy time is now the 16th January 2015.
* Patch is now live and we are tracking issues in the bugs megathread


-ToxicHawk

replies.body: Why do you guys ignore the rads error problem??
Dude, if you read the forums there has been many different ways to fix it put up
Having the same problem. Hope patch fix's the problem :(
I don't even know if this is because of the server shut down but the RADS %%%% is back
Let the hunger games begin! All feeders be prepared and may the odds be ever in your favor!
i see what you did there  {{champion:64}}
CANT LOGIN  "FRUSTRATING" sence its weekend and im not working. %%%%ing sux balls
Apperantly it's not only "ranked games". Game crashes on normal and everything. Hope you guys fix it soon.

> [{quoted}](name=Noivern,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=v8NkAKiP,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-13T12:17:44.386+0000)
>
> Patch 5.1, you say?

So i heard you like reaction faces...

On a more related note, this really screwed up my schedule... i had some coaching sessions rostered around the 16th...
Is the server being shut down have anything to do with the RADS, cause the problem is back -.-
The update stops at the time when it is nearly finished around 5.32 Mb. I been trying for many times. Hope it can be fixed soon.
i dont like when i wait :D i want to play what to do now i didnt want to sleep :( {{champion:238}} THE BEST :D
